module.name: GVoice SMS System
module.description: Allows sending SMS messages via Google Voice Send messages to a MySQL Group or Manual Number
module.changelog: *1.5* New home at GitHub Added MySQL dynamic drop down selection Dynamic Page Updating Character Counter Duplicate Page Submit Prevention Code Restructuring More JavaScript and JQuery *1.0* Now has FreePBX Module Changed to PHP Added MySQL Integration Password Protection Database Add/Delete/View Redesigned Web UI
